title: Stabilization and radion in de Sitter brane-world
abstract: We consider the stabilization of de Sitter brane-world. The scalar field bulk-brane theory produces the non-trivial minimum of modulus potential where temporal radion is realized. The hierarchy problem (between Planck and electroweak scales) may be solved. However, the interpretation of radion is not so clear as in AdS brane-world. In particulary, the introduction of two times physics or pair-creation of bulk spaces or identification of one of spatial coordinates with imaginary time (non-zero temperature) may be required.
